lead_paragraph: With a Hemingwayesque build and the distinctively rounded vowels of his native Australia, Mr. Hughes became as familiar a presence on television as he was in print.
snippet: With a Hemingwayesque build and the distinctively rounded vowels of his native Australia, Mr. Hughes became as familiar a presence on television as he was in print....

headline.print_headline: Robert Hughes, Art Critic Whose Writing Was Elegant and Contentious, Dies at 74
headline.main: Robert Hughes, Art Critic Whose Writing Was Elegant and Contentious, Dies at 74

abstract: Robert Hughes, Australian-born art critic, historian and television documentary maker who became known for his eloquent and combative views on modern art, dies at age 74.
